snippet.title: Beholder: Conductor | Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
A Beholder series spin-off. Welcome aboard the Determination Bringer, our nation's revered train! You have been appointed as the senior conductor, the most crucial figure on this journey. Become the face of justice, loyalty, and order – monitor passengers, report incidents, and execute Ministry assignments with the precision of a true patriot. Remember: the conductor’s word is law!
 
Wishlist on Steam now: https://s.team/a/2825530
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Beholder_Game
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/alawar
